metadata.Title: CVE-2015-7973 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - low
metadata.Description:
NTP before 4.2.8p6 and 4.3.x before 4.3.90, when configured in broadcastmode, allows man-in-the-middle attackers to conduct replay attacks bysniffing the network.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-7973` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

ntp - 1:4.2.8p4+dfsg-3ubuntu5.3
ntpdate - 1:4.2.8p4+dfsg-3ubuntu5.3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: ntp package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1:4.2.8p4+dfsg-3ubuntu5.3').
